Title: The Breakthrough Formula for Leadership Success with David Nurse
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to David Nurse, a former professional basketball player and Guinness World Record holder for three-point shooting, speaker and bestselling author. He shares his breakthrough formula and how you can push through limitations to get the results you want. Later in the episode, George chats with Suzanne Simms, the senior executive vice president of B2C, about her personal leadership transformation and a model we use at Ramsey Solutions to help leaders keep getting better.

 

You’ll learn:

  • What almost broke professional basketball player Jeremy Lin
  • The four habits that’ll help you experience breakthrough in your life
  • What success in life actually looks like
  • The three keys to becoming an influential leader
